LanguageData.VTE_SlowWorkSpeed.label: Rebelling
LanguageData.VTE_SlowWorkSpeed.description: Whether by sour mood or mental issues, rebelling means any forced work is met with snide comments and eyerolls, and taken less than seriously.
LanguageData.VTE_RestSlowFallFactor.label: Insomnia
LanguageData.VTE_RestSlowFallFactor.description: Pronounced mental or physical unrest causes insomnia, insomnia means one can often feel sluggish or exhausted and find themselves hardly ever capable of sleep.
LanguageData.VTE_SlowerBleedingRate.label: hyper-coagulant
LanguageData.VTE_SlowerBleedingRate.description: Higher red blood-cell count means hyper-coagulation occurs, causing wounds to bleed much less profusely.
LanguageData.VTE_HigherBleedingRate.label: hemophilic
LanguageData.VTE_HigherBleedingRate.description: Hemophilia is the inability for blood to clot properly, causing wounds to bleed much more profusely.
